channel.title: [Tut] Making your own server [Tut]
channel.description:
[size=14pt][font=Verdana]How To Make Your Own Server[/font][/size] Today ill be teaching you how to make your own server.
1.) Everything You Need. 2.) Setting up the Server. 3.) Making Admin/Mod Accounts.
Chapter 1 - Everything You Need There are only a few things you will really need to create your server. One is a program called Java Development Kit, or JDK for short. Another, is called WinRAR, which allows you to unzip .rar files.
Download JDK Here: [url=https://sdlc5d.sun.com/ECom/EComActionServlet;jsessionid=335FF540C70AE3848D4CD 34F1017DF91]https://sdlc5d.sun.com/ECom/EComActionServlet;jsessionid=335FF540C70AE3848D4CD 34F1017DF91[/url] Download to C:\Program Files\Java
Download WinRAR Here: [url=http://www.rarlab.com/download.htm]http://www.rarlab.com/download.htm[/url] (Click on the English version to start download) Download to C:\Documents and Settings\<your account>\Desktop
Download Client Here: [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=VFYWYMD1]http://www.megaupload.com/?d=VFYWYMD1[/url] Download to C:\Documents and Settings\<your account>\Desktop Or any client you wish to use. Decide Which Server you want to use some usefull ones i reccomend are these
Runescape blitz V2.7: [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=JTSUIORP]http://www.megaupload.com/?d=JTSUIORP[/url] rynescape v4(beta): [url=http://uppit.com/JD8BTO]http://uppit.com/JD8BTO[/url] Devolution_v7: [url=http://uppit.com/S9NFC6]http://uppit.com/S9NFC6[/url] Satan_s_Isle: [url=http://rs176.rapidshare.com/files/60887954/Satan_s_Isle.rar]http://rs176.rapidshare.com/files/60887954/Satan_s_Isle.rar[/url]
Once you get all of these things downloaded and installed, continue on to:
Chapter 2 - Setting up the Server
1.Open the folder server you downloaded, 2.Click RunServer.bat. Could Be server.bat Or run.bat 3.It Should Say Starting Server 4.Log In Any UserName / Password
Chapter 3 - Making Mod/Admin Accounts
1. Go To Your Server Folder 2. Click Charicters 3. Find Your Username you wish to give admin/mod 4. Double Click & NotePad Should Show Up 5. And Find| character-rights = 0 | 6. Change The 0 Into 3 For Owner. 2 For Admin. 1 For Mod. 7. Change To 3 And Click Save 8. Then Exit NotePad. 9. Then Sign Back in And the rights should be what ever you set them to
Thanks for reading my [tut] hoped its helped you. Need Any Help Ask Me.. ill be glad to help. my 1st [tut] so dont get mad at me thanks. Dazler09

item.title: [Tut] Making your own server [Tut]
item.dc:creator: @Dazler09 Dazler09
item.description:
@Dazler09 wrote:

[size=14pt][font=Verdana]How To Make Your Own Server[/font][/size]
Today ill be teaching you how to make your own server.

1.) Everything You Need.
2.) Setting up the Server.
3.) Making Admin/Mod Accounts.

Chapter 1 - Everything You Need
There are only a few things you will really need to create your server. One is a program called Java Development Kit, or JDK for short. Another, is called WinRAR, which allows you to unzip .rar files.

Download JDK Here: https://sdlc5d.sun.com/ECom/EComActionServlet;jsessionid=335FF540C70AE3848D4CD 34F1017DF91
Download to C:\Program Files\Java

Download WinRAR Here: http://www.rarlab.com/download.htm (Click on the English version to start download)
Download to C:\Documents and Settings<your account>\Desktop

Download Client Here: http://www.megaupload.com/?d=VFYWYMD1
Download to C:\Documents and Settings<your account>\Desktop
Or any client you wish to use.
Decide Which Server you want to use some usefull ones i reccomend are these

Runescape blitz V2.7: http://www.megaupload.com/?d=JTSUIORP
rynescape v4(beta): http://uppit.com/JD8BTO
Devolution_v7: http://uppit.com/S9NFC6
Satan_s_Isle: http://rs176.rapidshare.com/files/60887954/Satan_s_Isle.rar

Once you get all of these things downloaded and installed, continue on to:

Chapter 2 - Setting up the Server

1.Open the folder server you downloaded,
2.Click RunServer.bat. Could Be server.bat Or run.bat
3.It Should Say Starting Server
4.Log In Any UserName / Password

Chapter 3 - Making Mod/Admin Accounts

  1. Go To Your Server Folder
  2. Click Charicters
  3. Find Your Username you wish to give admin/mod
  4. Double Click & NotePad Should Show Up
  5. And Find| character-rights = 0 |
  6. Change The 0 Into 3 For Owner. 2 For Admin. 1 For Mod.
  7. Change To 3 And Click Save
  8. Then Exit NotePad.
  9. Then Sign Back in And the rights should be what ever you set them to

Thanks for reading my [tut] hoped its helped you.
Need Any Help Ask Meâ€¦ ill be glad to help.
my 1st [tut] so dont get mad at me thanks. Dazler09
